description: Representing Content in RDF as defined by http://www.w3.org/TR/Content-in-RDF/
label: Representing Content in RDF

ContentAsBase64.description: The base64 encoded content (can be used for binary content).
ContentAsBase64.label: Base64 content

ContentAsText.description: The text content (can be used for text content).
ContentAsText.label: Text content

ContentAsXML.description: The XML content (can only be used for XML-wellformed content).
ContentAsXML.label: XML content

bytes.description: The Base64 encoded byte sequence of the content.
bytes.label: Base64 encoded byte sequence

characterEncoding.description: The character encoding used to create a character sequence from a byte sequence or vice versa.
characterEncoding.label: Character encoding

chars.description: The character sequence of the text content.
chars.label: Character sequence

declaredEncoding.description: The character encoding declared in the XML declaration.
declaredEncoding.label: XML character encoding

internalSubset.description: The internal document type definition subset within the document type declarations.
internalSubset.label: Internal DTD subset

leadingMisc.description: The XML content preceding the document type declaration.
leadingMisc.label: XML leading misc

publicId.description: The document type declarations's public identifier.
publicId.label: Public ID

rest.description: The XML content following the document type declaration.
rest.label: XML rest

standalone.description: The standalone declaration in the XML declaration.
standalone.label: XML standalone document declaration

systemId.description: The document type declarations's system identifier (typed: xsd:anyURI)
systemId.label: System ID

version.description: The XML version declared in the XML declaration.
version.label: XML version
